name: Octowhip
description:
Down below in the deep blue ocean, there is an octopus. The dangers are many, but the need for food is great. Fight off enemies and collect shrimp to survive.
  • Experience a visually pleasing illustrative artstyle
  • Replay value 

Octowhip is made as part of the game design course at Kristiania University college. This is a project made by students.
